author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Enforcement Directorate has provisionally attached assets worth Rs. 97 lakh in connection with the money-laundering investigations against a former IAS officer in the 2008 Shaheed-e-Azam Bhagat Singh birth centenary celebrations “embezzlement” case in Punjab.

According to the Enforcement Directorate, the assets belong to Swaran Singh, accused in the case registered by the Punjab Vigilance Bureau in 2011, alleging financial irregularities in organising an event at Bhagat Singh’s native village in Khatkar Kalan in September 2008.
title: ED provisionally attaches assets of ex-IAS officer
